subject: Negotiation
title: Win-Win vs. Win-Lose
description: A quick, practical guide to Win-Win vs. Win-Lose.

hook.text: A Harvard book published in 1981 changed how deals are taught worldwide.

buildup.text: Win-lose treats every deal as a fixed pie â€” your gain is my loss.

discovery.text: Win-win means expanding the pie by finding value neither side saw before.

twist.text: Win-win isn't being soft. It's being creative about what each side truly needs.

climax.text: Studies show win-win deals last longer and produce more repeat business.

punchline.text: The best deals leave both sides bragging they won.
